recipe.description:
Prep time: 15 mins	Cook time: 15 mins	Total time: 30 mins
Servings: 2
recipe.instructions: Brown ground beef with onion until onion is transparent. Stir in flour. Cook for 2 - 3 minutes more. Stir in milk, let thicken but do not boil. Add salt and pepper. Serve over mashed potatoes.
